8 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\HasNotNullInterface;
9 
10 abstract class ValidatorMultiple extends Validator implements HasNotNullInterface{
11 
12  protected $violation;
13  protected $notNull;
14 
15  public function __construct(){
16  $this->message=[
17  "notNull"=>"This value should not be null"
18  ];
19  $this->notNull=false;
20  }
21 
22  public function validate($value) {
23  if(null==$value){
24  if($this->notNull===true){
25  $this->violation="notNull";
26  return false;
27  }else{
28  return;
29  }
30  }
31  if (!UString::isValid($value)) {
32  throw new ValidatorException('This value can not be converted to string');
33  }
34  return true;
35  }
36 
40  protected function mergeMessages(){
41  if(!isset($this->modifiedMessage)){
42  return $this->message;
43  }else{
44  if(is_array($this->modifiedMessage) && is_array($this->message)){
45  return array_merge($this->message,$this->modifiedMessage);
46  }else{
47  return $this->modifiedMessage;
48  }
49  }
50  }
51 
52  protected function _getMessage(){
53  $parameters=$this->getParameters();
54  $message=$this->mergeMessages();
55  if(isset($this->violation) && is_array($message)){
56  $message=$this->_getMessageViolation($message);
57  }
58  foreach ($parameters as $param){
59  $message=str_replace("{".$param."}", $this->$param, $message);
60  }
61  return $message;
62  }
63 
64  protected function _getMessageViolation($messages){
65  if(isset($messages[$this->violation])){
66  return $messages[$this->violation];
67  }
68  return current($messages);
69  }
70 
71 
72 }
